column6: "OUT, OUT..." This is the X-Men comic that will have people talking for years! Some candles burn twice as bright and half as long. Some candles don't get a chance to burn at all.  Generation Hope discover what happens when a light goes out.
column8: | penciller (cover):Salvador Espin | writer:Kieron Gillen | editor:Nick Lowe | penciller:Jamie McKelvie
